topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538aaea76368727b96f10100#post_538aaea76368727b96f10100
I won't even say it's bad.
The entire conflict of the movie stems from Mewtwo trying to answer the questions that drive us all "Who am I?" "Why am I here?" The entire movie was him trying to find a way to justify his own existence. That's some heavy shot for a kids movie!
